text: the name of the Broncos backup kicker is Mitch Ewald. Let's hope he finds his way to an NFL roster... <https://twitter.com/MitchEwald/status/495650916738285568>

attachments.fallback: <https://twitter.com/MitchEwald|@MitchEwald>: Always a good day at Mile High stadium when you start off in 18's stretch line... #PlayingWithPeyton #RookieHaircut <https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BuDn4JICAAAI00X.jpg>

text: It's very weird to hear them say Ewald during the game
